monet.util.mystats.ETS(obs, mod, minval, maxval)¶

Equitable Threat Score (1 is perfect - Range -1/3 -> 1) :param obs: :param mod: :param minval: :param maxval: :return: HSS

monet.util.mystats.HSS(obs, mod, minval, maxval)¶

Heidke Skill Score (1 is perfect - below zero means no confidence) :param obs: :param mod: :param minval: :param maxval: :return: HSS

monet.util.tools module¶

monet.util.tools.findclosest(list, value)¶
monet.util.tools.kolmogorov_zurbenko_filter(df, window, iterations)¶
monet.util.tools.linregress(x, y)¶

This function returns the ordinary least squares fit of two 1D arrays, x and y using the statsmodels library sm.OLS.

Parameters:
  • x (numpy array) – Array of x values
  • y (numpy array) – Array of Y values
Returns:
Return type:

type [a, b, r^2, std_err]
